Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers are looking to continue their three-game road winning streak.
The Rockets have gone 14-8 against Western Conference opponents.
The Lakers are sixth in the Western Conference with 15.9 fast break points per game led by LeBron James averaging 4.6.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets are the worst team in the Western Conference shooting 32.5% from 3-point range.
The Lakers average 11.8 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.5 fewer makes per game than the Rockets allow.
The Rockets are shooting 44.1% from the field this season, 3.5 percentage points lower than the 47.6% the Lakers allow to opponents.
Others: The game is scheduled for Sunday, 7 p.m. EST.
The Rockets have the following injuries: Jae'Sean Tate (day to day, illness), Tari Eason (day to day, rest), Jabari Smith Jr. (out, hand).
The Lakers have the following injuries: Jarred Vanderbilt (out, knee), Gabe Vincent (day to day, oblique), Christian Wood (out, knee), Jalen Hood-Schifino (day to day, hamstring).
